section1.question1: Your answer as text - name the department
section1.question2: Your answer as a percentage with 1 decimal place (e.g., 12.5%)
section1.question3: Your answer as department name and percentage with 1 decimal place (e.g., 'Department Name - 25.3%')

section2.question1: Your answer as product category name followed by description of pattern
section2.question2: Your answer as a number with 2 decimal places
section2.question3: Your answer as month name and reasoning in 1-3 sentences

section3.question1: Your answer as name of economic indicator and brief explanation
section3.question2: Your answer as expected impact (positive/negative) with estimated percentage change
section3.question3: Your answer as department name with 1-2 sentence explanation

section4.question1: Your answer as a list with each product and weeks of supply with 1 decimal place (e.g., 'Product A: 8.2 weeks')
section4.question2: Your answer as product name and specific timing in weeks
section4.question3: Your answer as number of units for each product in format 'Product A: X units, Product B: Y units, etc.' with budget allocation explanation

section5.question1: Your answer as dollar amount with no decimal places (e.g., $312000)
section5.question2: Your answer indicating direction (up/down) and percentage with 1 decimal place
section5.question3: Your answer as dollar amount with no decimal places and brief explanation
